entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 4 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
